title: Task 2 Chkpt 3 - Solar case too far on the charging panel

content.raw:
When teleporting to Checkpoint 3 in Task 2, the case is placed a little too far over on the charging table. It is difficult to reach with arms.
Getting legs to make contact with the table sometimes makes Val unstable and freeze.
So it is better to have the solar panel case little closer to reach with arms.
content.html: When teleporting to Checkpoint 3 in Task 2, the case is placed a little too far over on the charging table. It is difficult to reach with arms. Getting legs to make contact with the table sometimes makes Val unstable and freeze. So it is better to have the solar panel case little closer to reach with arms.
